
set(XML_SOURCE_FILE ${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/tinyxml2/tinyxml2.cpp PARENT_SCOPE)
set(XML_INCLUDE_FILE ${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/tinyxml2/tinyxml2.h PARENT_SCOPE)
set(MONGOOSE_SOURCE_FILE ${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/mongoose/mongoose.c PARENT_SCOPE)
set(MONGOOSE_INCLUDE_FILE ${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/mongoose/mongoose.h PARENT_SCOPE)
set(JSON_SOURCE_FILE ${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/json/jsoncpp.cpp PARENT_SCOPE)
set(JSON_INCLUDE_FILE ${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/json/json.h PARENT_SCOPE)
